name: Arcanite Magician/Assault Mode
effectText: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate". If this card is Special Summoned: Place 2 Spell Counters on it. Gains 1000 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card; destroy all cards your opponent controls. When this card on the field is destroyed: You can target 1 "Arcanite Magician" in your GY; Special Summon that target.
